website_summaries.verdict: A solid hook-on high chair that includes some nice extras.
pros: Fits tables up to 3.5" thick and holds children up to 37 lbs
Comes with a built-in carrying bag that is attached to the bottom for extra padding
Includes a back pocket and tray
cons: The tray leaves a gap where food can fall through

customer_reviews.title: Fell off the table with baby in it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. Then one day the chair just fell off the side of the table with the baby in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Best high chairs I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chairs! I run a daycare and use them every day! They clean so easily with just a wet towel. The material is thick and sturdy and they screw very snugly on the table! I have seen reviews from people saying the belt is not tight enough but I have never had that problem with all ages of children. My number one choice of high chair! Plus they fold down and can be put in the storage bag attached very quickly and easily. I have used many kind of high chairs but these are the best, space saving and great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if not fatal design flaw of space between counter!
customer_reviews.text: The fatal flaw- the one inch gap between baby and counter that others speak of is real. The counter cannot be flush with the seat, the gap I put my hand into in the photo is big and much food is lost. Nothing can repair this sufficiently. It’s such a waste of money- your kid will just palm the counter and drop food! Besides that, pretty nice design and fabric. Hard to clean and clip is in stupid place with little cover tab over it that kid picks at and makes dirty, making it even harder to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to clean, baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean! The other high chair we had attached to a chair. It was difficult to clean & the baby hated sitting in it. I didn’t realize he didn’t like it (& it was harder to clean) until we bought the Ingesina. He loves it! Feels like a king. Sits at the table with us, watches us cook. Loves eating in it. We’ve taken it to restaurants & it travels well. Very well made. We probably should have bought the tray with it. Would have been even easier to clean (lol). But it’s great. Buy it. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: DustyRoad

customer_reviews.title: Mind the gap
customer_reviews.text: Major design flaw. We like this chair, easy to get baby in and out of. But it has a gap between the counter and the chair where 75% of the meal inevitably goes. This is by far, has made it the messiest chair I have have owned yet because of this. (This is our fifth) feeding chair. Other than the chair is great. Easy to assemble and take down to clean. May I suggest getting a darker color. My husband choose tan and we have to wash it a lot since it stains. Peanut butter is the worse.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean. Say bye bye to food-it will fall through the gap!
customer_reviews.text: This chair has a huge gap between the table piece and the floor. It is impossible to keep food from falling in between. I ended up cutting up a plastic cutting board to slide under the tray to close up the space but it is still less than ideal. The chair has to be taken apart to be washed and is a huge pain to reassemble. Why in the world would someone design a chair for babies and toddlers that can’t be either easily wiped down or taken apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pratt

customer_reviews.title: So travel friendly, easy to clean, and easy to incorporate baby into the family meal.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been traveling around the country for over a month now and this comes with us everywhere. While we don’t take it to restaurants it certainly wouldn’t be too much of a hassle. We’ve found a surface this can attach to at every location we’ve stayed, including some tables with lips. I’m not sure how others are choosing to clean this, but we’ve found a wet sponge works like a charm. It folds flat and takes up a small amount of luggage space that isn’t anything by comparison. Highly recommend. We love it so much we’re skipping purchasing an actual high chair once we return home and using this until baby transitions into a booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: sjbzher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy baby chair, get tons of compliments. I have some wishlist additions
customer_reviews.text: We love this baby chair! We get compliments every restaurant we go from other moms asking us where we bought it. It is very easy to assemble. It is sturdy and holds the baby firmly in place. I wish it would come with a bag in which to carry it since you kinda have to hold it in the right position for it not to unfold when transporting. I also wish it would have a net or something to catch anything that falls between the edge of the chair and the table at the front. I’ve lost spoons and toys that way. But this is more of a wishlist than issues with the product. Overall we love this chair!
customer_reviews.author: PMB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality High weight capacity Comfortable Secure Areas of improvement
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Good quality High weight capacity Comfortable Secure Areas of improvement: No pocket to keep the metal pieces when the chair is not in use No travel bag *These are very important when dealing with baby gear. Parts need to be kept together so you don't inadvertently lose anything, and a travel bag is important so you can easily lug it around. Preferably a travel bag with a zipper and a handle.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Really really like this
customer_reviews.text: This is super nice and convenient for a small space or if you just dont like clutter. We bought it for my mother in law when we have dinner at their house and I really like it. It's small enough to store away when you don't need it and really doesn't take up any space when you are using it. I would have loved to have it in my own home but our table has a big lip and I just wasnt sure if it would have worked for our table but it works for a table with no lip or a small lip.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fabozzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for grandson to replace clunky high chair. It is very easy to put up and take down. Secure, stable and easy to wipe clean. There is a gap between the counter and the seat so yes, food falls through there. Simple answer was to put a silicone mat that suctions to my granite counter and lays over the edge of the chair. Easy to put 18 month old in and get out. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bebak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for baby.
customer_reviews.text: We use it mainly when we go out to eat. It’s nice that we can use this instead of the high chair. I like the cloth material and it’s pretty easy to use. Twist down to release, twist up to tighten. The reminders and warnings are in the seat so we can always check and double check the table if it is proper to use this portable chair. We used it for the first time and our LO didn’t mind it at all. He was happy and comfortable to be sitting at the table and minding his own business while we ate.
customer_reviews.author: C. Liang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair after using one at a restaurant. We had another brand already and it was such a pain to set up and take down. The Inglesina chair is a breeze for both set up and take down. Comes with its own attach carrying case (so you can’t lose it) and because you twist the handles yourself vs them already being at a certain height (like other chair brands) it is much easier to attach to a wide variety of table widths. The sticker shock seems a bit much (I opted for an open box one for this reason) but so so so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works great at most restaurants
customer_reviews.text: Works great at most restaurants, as long as the table isn't wobbly. Allows our daughter to be up at the table, while with most high chairs she's barely able to get her arms onto the table. One thing that would make this even more incredible would be battery-powered clamps. Opening and closing the "screw" clamps, especially on tables that have a "lip", can take a long time and is awkward when you're trying to get your child seated as quickly as possible. Having them open or close with the push of a button would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Out of the bajillions of baby things companies sell, very few are actually durable and make life easier for the long haul with a kid. My 26 month old has been sitting comfortably in this thing for 17+ months - the whole thing is washable (I air dry, it's like NASA and a wet suit company collaborated and it dries so fast, especially laying out in sun in the backyard or hung to a clothesline). It's so sturdy and reliable - out of all the things I could buy for a kid, this and diapers are the only things you REALLY ACTUALLY NEED, lol!
customer_reviews.author: historygirl

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: The function, durability, and ease to use is a game changer. I use it everyday as my little one prefers it over his much more expensive traditional high chair. It's also a space saver. The only small complaint is the snap strap. It's a little hard to unlock while the child is seated because the snaps are sideways and I feel like he or she can be pinched. Having that said, it is secure. Overall I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CHAR O.

customer_reviews.title: Helped our baby no longer scream during meals
customer_reviews.text: Our baby used to SCREAM during meal times in regular high chairs. Our developmental therapist said she tested high in the social aspect, so she suggested we find a high chair that hooks on to the table. FIRST meal we did this, she didn't scream!! She just wanted to be a part of the family. Forever grateful to the woman who suggested we get this. Cleans easily, installs easily. I will say, don't store it in your garage or attic if it has crumbs of food in it - ours got eaten by mice. :( But we have plans to buy another for our next baby because that's how much we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Stripped bolt
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this a little less than a year and suddenly one of the bolts attaching the chair to the table appears to be stripped. It won't tighten. I have only detached and reattached it a few times, for cleaning the arms. Very disappointed, at this price point. Was hoping to use this for the next child also. :(
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this chair at all. The gap between the table is just crazy. Whole nuggets can fit in the gap lol . And the cloth in the front of the chair just gets soaked with food and it smells horrible after a day
customer_reviews.author: Mttol

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this highchair!...despite having to throw it in the washer constantly because it can't be wipped down. But once my little man turned 11 months he got into the standing phase. It only has a belt to go around his waiste. No matter how tight we make it, hes still able to stand up and then get out. This product needs a 5 point harness system.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee

customer_reviews.title: Just get it (or gift it!)
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone using this exact product in a restaurant and had to ask what it was and where I could get one, then I bought the same exact one. This seat is sturdy, with thick material, and clamps on TIGHT to any sturdy table you might come across. Spinning the clamps to get it on tables takes a bit of practice and can get annoying at times especially tables that have a large lip, but I wouldn’t let that dissuade anyone from getting this if they plan to get it for home or for dining out. We bring ours with us everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased 2 more for my friend's kids
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! We never purchased a normal high chair. We just use this one and take it with us when we travel. We love it so much, I have purchased it for 2 other people having babies...they also love it! I thought it was kind of pricey but it still looks great (2 years later) and I probably wash it twice a month. It is made of a durable material like a bookbag. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair. The snaps are covered so less food gets stick in them. Easy to clean , very durable fabric and well made!! Pricey but I love that baby can sit with me at the table in a secure seat! Plus it fits my 3"+ thick table ledge (kinda snug but it fit!) only thing that is bothersome is the gap between table and chair allows baby to scoop food on the floor before he can get it up to his mouth. This also is good though because it cuts down on the amount of food that falls into the seat. So it's worth it, over all I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: A baby must have- especially if you travel
customer_reviews.text: I never had one of these for my first child and wow was I missing out! This high chair goes everywhere with us. Perfect for at hone, at restaurants, the babysitters and to throw in the RV for our weekend trips. Couldn’t live without this! I just washed it and it cleaned up really well and re-assembled easily. The attached carrying bag is a nice touch but honestly it’s so simple just to tote around that it isn’t even necessary. Just with the attachable tray wasn’t so expensive. There is a small gap between the high chair and the table but hey, that’s what dogs are for!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: This is better than a high chair. Buy this right now!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!! We bought it for our 20lb 1.5 year old (who loves it) but our 30lb 3.5 year old loves it as well. We bought this on recommendation from one of my friends and it is super awesome in our tiny historic home with its small footprint and portability. Not the easiest to clean, but with a little elbow grease and a few kid-free minutes, it looks great! LOVE THIS. You probably need this, just buy one. Or two.
customer_reviews.author: MeeshTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Superior to Chicco 360 -easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: We are doing Baby Led Weaning with our little one, and like this chair way more than the Chicco 360 purely for the ease of cleaning! Still have to disassemble, but can throw in the washing machine without too much hassle. No nooks and crannies for all the food to get trapped in. I wish the material would wipe clean a little easier, but as long as we can put it in the wash once a week it will work. It’s sturdy, safe, and comfy. Buy the tray too- it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It makes it super easy to eat out and get your child to the inside of the booth or table away from stupid people who think they can come right up and touch your child because they're so cute. ****More importantly it protects the child from getting stuff spilled on them by a waiter/waitress, and you dont have to worry if the restaurant has cleaned the high chair in this decade****
customer_reviews.author: RBM4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table Top Baby Chair
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5 1/2 week baby who can sit up and we wanted something small and sturdy. Ordered this a few weeks ago. It is relatively easy to assemble, although I had to help my wife pull the cover over the metal frame. Once you have it assembled it is a sturdy, well-made unit. The black tips at the end telescope up and down so you can type in the chair against your table top. It’s functional and cute. It has an interior belt to hold the baby up while they are using it. The cover comes off and can be washed. Overall it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Armi

customer_reviews.title: Not in love with the new design
customer_reviews.text: We have the old and new model. In theory, I understand why the new design has a cover on the side bars. Apparently, babies were placing their feet in the U-shaped rails and using them as leverage to launch themselves. Mine haven't figured this feature out yet but might some day. In practice, it's a total pain. With the covers, you can't fold the chair or screw it onto the table. Once it is screwed onto the table, it takes some skilled contortionist work to get the covers on particularly if you're mounting them to a booth seat. In the end, we don't use the covers and they just get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fiend

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea, just hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is awesome for taking baby to family gatherings and it makes for a great space saver. Clean up is awful though 😭. It is not supposed to be washed or dried in a machine so I hand wash, run it on a delicate cycle and air dry it. It takes a while to dry so I have to plan the day I wash it. You also need to buy the tray or you lose all your food in the small gap between the chair and the table and also food gets mashed under the arms that hold it to the table. 😅 I like the chair but I hate the clean up 🤔😬
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Bought an extra for Grandma and Grandpa's house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and easy to take along with you. Thought that the design could be tweaked a little to make cleaning easier. Not a deal breaker though. The tray option is a must to make clean up a breeze. Didn't have instructions to assemble and had an issue initially with the leg holes attaching to the arms. Figured it out later.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen U.

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased multiple!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one we have purchased - we love it so much we like to leave the other one at my parents. This is a lifesaver. I read that if a child eats at the same table with you it develops their table manners early. We have already seen this to be true. Our daughter is able to sit at our island with us each night and be right next to us. It also allows us to not have a cluncky high chair sitting around. Would recommend to anyone - whether you have the room for a normal highchair or not! Easy to snap off and bring to restaurants as well.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyE

customer_reviews.title: Great portable chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great, it is very portable. I do not like the bag attached to the bottom, I do wish it could be detachable and just a pocket to put it under. But overall it is a great product, also purchased the tray for this chair and it fits perfectly, now my granddaughter can't flip her food over.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby item
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair so much. We bring it everywhere. I hate the height on most restaurant high chairs because my son only has to bend his head down slightly for lean a little bit forward to be in danger of smashing his face on the table. This chair keeps him at the perfect height and has more back support and is super super secure and safe. I have no worries about him being in it even on higher tables and he loves being a part of the group at meals.
customer_reviews.author: Manders

customer_reviews.title: Great sassy chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I've been using it for about a year now. I travel with it, I keep it in the car, I can't go anywhere without it...I've gotten many compliments, especially how quick and easy it is to set it up and take it down and slid it back in the attaches pouch! It's extremely safe and sturdy and will use it until the weight limit recommended by the manufacturer. There have been instances when we couldn't use the chair because of the lip of the table but majority of the time it fits! The bright color is amazing! I haven't needed to wash it yet but have been spot cleaning and it's held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. M

customer_reviews.title: Must have for traveling dinners!
customer_reviews.text: We love them! We bought a lesser expensive one from Target and took them back. My sister-in-law had this and recommended it. It is WELL worth the money. It attaches very securely and the kids fit in them great. Huge difference FINALLY being able to go out to eat. It comes with a draw bag inside the back pocket that wraps it up for quick on the go. Highly recommend for parents on the go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adsit

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The best portable high chair! (And I've tried others too....) It's so easy to attach to your counter or bar top. The way it attaches allows you to attach it to shallower bar tops vs the competitors product (which has huge arms for attaching ... works on very few counters ... speaking from experience) Very sturdy and stable. My son moves constantly and he will actually sit in this long enough to eat so it must be comfortable for the kiddos. All the fabric is detachable so it's super easy to wash and then reattach. It is pricey but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Puts baby where the action is!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it six stars I would! I've installed it at our kitchen island bar, and my baby absolutely loves being where the action is! I can finally make dinner again! And best part, it's not a big bulky high chair that's in the way! I haven't taken it to restaurants or anything, I just love having it in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a vacation and it worked out great. The chair folds flat and didn't take up much room in my luggage. It was easy to put together and secured well to the table. My daughter used it for a week and it was easy to slide her in and out of it. There was a small gap between the chair and the table where food did slip to the floor but it didn't cause much of an issue in my opinion. Very happy with my purchase and anticipate getting a lot of use out of this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: This little seat is quite possibly the greatest piece of baby gear we have
customer_reviews.text: This little seat is quite possibly the greatest piece of baby gear we have. Our daughter hates her carseat, her stroller, and pretty much anywhere we decide to put her down for more than 10 seconds. But this chair..... she LOVES IT!!!! She will sit in it with a toy for hours and keep herself busy watching everyone. It's also incredibly sturdy and portable (which is a rare combination) and getting the extra little tray is awesome for meals on the go because we don't have to worry about whatever might be on the table. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi B Greatens

customer_reviews.title: great chair for babies!
customer_reviews.text: i like the chair overall, is very convenient, some what easy to clean, easy to assemple, yes i agree about "the gap" but with the plastic table insert is less and i did not see much of an issue. I will definelty recommed because we did not want to purchase another high chair and this one works well for the baby .
customer_reviews.author: A. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, to take off the table and on. Also very attractive. I love that you can cover the bars that go under the table where the side panels that zip up. It also helps to keep the bars and twos locks clean Doesn’t have a wide clearance. The table can only be a few inches thick. One thing I was very disappointed about was that the chair does NOT have the little Italian flag on the back!! I thought it looked so nice but that is not the way the product is when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the other space saving high chair we tried first
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this except one very minor thing...we spot clean it because we didn't feel like it would dry well enough if we put it in the washing machine since the attached bag is in a zippered pocket under the seat. I do stress that this is a very minor issue for us and spot cleaning it hasn't been difficult because it's pretty easy to get the fabric part off the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Moore

customer_reviews.title: Best personal highchair
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My mom had one for my little brother so I knew to look for this. Easy to put together and small enough to pack away. Got so many compliments on it and so many people are shocked to see me bring my own chair. Love the little pocket in the back to store you place mat and utensils and such. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Xoxo

customer_reviews.title: To make sure the legs are snapped in
customer_reviews.text: We love this over having a highchair in our small 2 bedroom house on the water. We are space limited with our "Little Shack" as we call it. This hooks onto the Island counter top just perfectly. We also can take to a restaurant and not have our little grandson sitting in a highchair that lots of others have sat in and chewed on etc..... So like the fact can help on the germ end of things.
customer_reviews.author: CH of Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel
customer_reviews.text: Some days I don't know why I have a high chair. I purchased this for travel but it make so much more sense that the bulky high chair that I just had to have at the time. A space saver and genius item to have. I currently keep mine in my car for restaurants and visits at friends houses. I liked the structure of this one better than some of the others because the arms under the table do not stick out very far so it fits on most tables and counters.
customer_reviews.author: JackieSudduth

customer_reviews.title: 4mo old girl was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited with the package! 1.4mo old girl was very happy with it! She normally doesnt like to be put in a stroller/high chair/baby chair, but this---she loves! She tried to free herself from the straps without unbuckling and went up the table and went back to the seat again :) she did it over 5 times. Best not to leave the child alone, as you know how kids can get their own wriggly self out.
customer_reviews.author: Lalie Y Gothong

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading reviews now and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: BUY BUY BUY this!!!! Okay, I can not rave enough about this seat! Two kids in and my only regret is that I didn’t put this thing on my first registry. My daughter is a year and I barely bought this but it was super easy to install, quick to take off, wash, great for travel. It has a great pocket in the back for wipes or whatever you want. Even my husband commented on me making a good purchase with it. Which he rarely notices the baby products I buy. Lol! Yes price could be a little better but trust me it’s not a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Works with a 4" inch table lip and 1.5" top!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned this wouldnt work on our table which has a 4" lip. Happy to say it does with a slight wiggle to get it on initially. Easy to snap arms on and easy to tighten to table, just twist arms upward. Looking forward to using it out and about mostly at restaurants and family and friends houses when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this seat. It is so easy and convenient for restaurants! Allows our baby to be at the table with us. Hostesses are always so complimentary of it. We even use it at home and clip it on our island. Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen LaRue

customer_reviews.title: this one is so easy to install and clean and the baby gets to ...
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY, DEFINITELY, DEFINITELY, DEFINITELY BUY ONE OF THESE CHAIRS, IT DOES NOT MATTER THE COLOR, JUST BUY IT. . . it is SOOOOOOOOOOOO CONVENIENT!!!!! i have the old fashioned high chair and this one. . . this one is so easy to install and clean and the baby gets to sit right next to you at the table as part of the family. my nephews and my daughter all use this. and i even bought one for my mom's house when they visit. (very easy to store and transport)
customer_reviews.author: D MIAMI

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's visit over the holidays. It was very compact. My brother assembled it quickly. However, the high chair that if supposed to fit most tables didn't fit any of the tables or counters at my parent's house. It seems like it would only fit a thin tabletop with no lip and no decorations. That's my theory since I never saw it actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Wearegroot

customer_reviews.title: Get it and use it!!! Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: One of our must have items!!! Seriously use this everywhere!!! We are going on a trip and may pack it too. It’s so nice to have a clean seat for our baby at restaurants/friends/family homes. It’s so portable and useful when visiting people and want your baby to eat or sit in one particular spot. Ours can’t focus on eating without sitting down. Makes our lives easier and less germs is always a win. Only wish it was a clamp system for being quicker than twisting to adjust attachment, but love the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get off once mounted, but we love this item. It’s a huge relief to be able to take baby out to dinner and be at family functions where she can sit at a table with us instead of the hassle of dragging a stroller or car seat wherever we go. We use this every day, our baby sits at our kitchen table in it while I prepare bottles, or have a quick meal / snack. Highly recommend & worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best highchair!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can easily travel with this piece!!! It is super easy to move and assemble!! My daughter loves her seat!!! The only drawback to this highchair is that it is not the easiest to keep clean. It wipes fairly clean, but for a deep clean it doesn’t look easy to take the cover off(hence why I haven’t done it yet). Overall, I am extremely pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Boland

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much I got rid of my high chair
customer_reviews.text: Had a Grecco high chair, which felt large and clucky... even in our larger kitchen. We didn't need the space-saving benefit, but are so happy with this chair. It's the perfect for our counter-height island. The previous high chair wasn't tall enough. But, it also works with our lower dining table. Plus, it's travel-friendly and MUCH better to look at than the previous one!
customer_reviews.author: DM929

customer_reviews.title: This thing goes EVERYWHERE with us
customer_reviews.text: We’ve traveled a ton this summer, and being able to throw this in the car is so easy! I’m not sure if you’re supposed to machine wash it, but I have once so far and I just washed it on delicate and hung it to dry and it seems fine. Easy to set up and feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Summer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We don't spend money on much for kids. Strollers, baby wearing carriers, carseats and this thing are the only things we decided it really mattered. Just spend the money and get one great one and you're done. This is that quality item you should get.
customer_reviews.author: Missy B.

customer_reviews.title: Received destroyed box containing used item
customer_reviews.text: A little frustrated with the presentation of this item upon receiving. The box was all but destroyed and it had clearly been opened before. The prior shipping label was even just blackened out but I could still see the name and address. The item was completely put together and was obviously a returned item and or used. Though I think I like the chair after only using for two days I Am perturbed at getting a $70 item for my baby USED.....
customer_reviews.author: Mizpah72

customer_reviews.title: Good little chair.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this little chair. It fits a variety of different style/thickness tables. Very sturdy. Quick release safety belt. My one complaint is that it doesn’t come with a carry bag—for the price that would have been nice. This chair comes apart pretty quickly and washes and dries well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great for kitchen islands
customer_reviews.text: We use this instead of a high chair for our one year old. We have an island in our kitchen, so we have it attached permanently because it's so much easier to feed him there. He also likes to be at this higher level - especially when we're running around cleaning, cooking, etc. because he feels closer to the action. I haven't traveled with it yet but it is very easy to take on and off so I wouldn't think it would be a problem. I've washed it in the washer/dryer and it comes out good as new.
customer_reviews.author: AliAmazon

customer_reviews.title: The best high chair
customer_reviews.text: The best high chair! We love it. Almost everyone compliments us on it and wants one. We definitely recommend Pros: •easily taken down and put back up •design is great •very sturdy, I put most of my weight in and pulled it didn't budge •the seat is easy to wipe down •the bag!!!! • hooks on to almost all tables •doesn't have the long bars underneath like some hook on chairs do Cons: •the strap on the front is really hard to clean and almost always looks dirty •to tighten and untighten you have to turn left to tighten and right to loosen (probably not a con in most people's opinion but it bothers my husband and I)
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best seat I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I have tried out three different counter seats for my toddler. This is by far the easiest to install, takes up the least amount of space, and works the best on a variety of different counters. Some of the other brands require 12 inches of under counter space to install. Also, I can get in the cabinets under the counter easily with this one as it's not bulky so it doesn't block access to things. It doesn't come with a bag but we do not tend to take it places so it doesn't matter to me. I bought the Amazon Warehouse one (open box) and it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mrawson

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m kicking myself a little for not having bought one of these for my older two. I’m so sick of dealing with space hogging high chairs that I bought this for my daughter. It hooks on to our countertop perfectly, and is really sturdy. Simple to put together just by glancing at the pictures in the instructions. It also is quite a bit more supportive than our other regular high chair, due to the high sides on it (which is a trait of basically all of this type of baby seat, but it’s still handy) so a baby with less than perfect core strength won’t flop around. All in all, it’s a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Great seat. Don't think color descriptions are accurate.
customer_reviews.text: In this seat is great! We Love it! We use it as our daily chair, for every meal. At the end of the week, we just toss it in the wash and we are ready for another food adventure haha. My only issue I have with the product is the color and color description. I purchased the "Fuchsia" color and the seat I received, just looks like a faded purple. And not as pinky/fuchsia and vibrant as advertised. But over all it's a great seat.
customer_reviews.author: MeggieJay

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby products we own!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most amazing baby/kid products we own. When we take it to restaurants, everyone stops and asks us about it. It takes up less aisle space, isn’t full of germs, and is easy to pop on and off. Our 30-lb, 20 mo-old toddler fits great in it. The only tables that it doesn’t work for are the really flimsy kind. Otherwise, it works just about everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: LilFam

customer_reviews.title: Received used item
customer_reviews.text: Received a used item in an incredibly damaged box, returned it for a replacement and received yet another used item. Both boxes have clearly been opened and poorly repackaged. The shipping info from the previous recipient was just marked over with a thick black marker. For a product that is designed for infants I would expect better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: RPAmz

customer_reviews.title: High quality and stable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who was coming from out of state for a visit. I was apprehensive about the quality and whether it would shift once attached to the table. I was SUPER impressed with the quality of the seat - and once I clamped it to the table, it was not going anywhere! He felt like such big man to be sitting up at the table like all of the adults - and once clamped it did not move one bit. Very high quality - sturdy! I am buying another one for my daughter to use with him at their home.
customer_reviews.author: RanFan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, washes great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the chair a lot. I just washed the cover for the first time and it really came out well! We have the cream color too - so I was a bit worried. It was mostly easy to get apart and back together, once we figured it out. We really love that this saves a lot of floor space by removing the big bulky high chair we had. Our son seems to like being at the island with us and the "big kids" so I definitely recommend it! Our son is 34 lbs, which I think is nearing the top end of the weight suggestion. It seems perfectly secure and I have no worries about that!
customer_reviews.author: Westchesters

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We read all kinds of reviews about this high chair where people talked about the big gap and blah blah blah.... We just went and purchased the bigger tray and that's not an issue for us! We love this thing! Perfect for going out to eat and not having a big bulky highchair in our already small house! Such a good purchase for us!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra S.

customer_reviews.title: Compact High Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this is compact and doesn't leave a huge footprint in our dining room. It is also great that LO can eat right at the table just like Mom and Dad. It takes a lot longer to attach it to the table then I anticipated so I don't see myself taking it to restaurants with me like I had envisioned but for at home use its great. LO seems decently comfortable, she is still on the younger side but she seems to do as good sitting up in this as anything else. I do love the sleek design, the navy is great and doesn't scream "baby."
customer_reviews.author: Kloe1

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second chair I have ordered (lost the first one in a cross country move.) I LOVE this chair. It’s super sturdy, fold relatively flat for travel, easy to use, and is machine washable. I have five kids and know when I like a baby product and this one is a must have in my eyes. Yes it’s for when a baby or toddler is sitting unassisted, but when that happens I suggest getting this!
customer_reviews.author: Kammy Bernard

customer_reviews.title: parents of 6 mos old grandsom say it works well
customer_reviews.text: product was a gift. My son and DIL live in small NYC apartment and this fit thier dining room table and is easily folded up when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Printsky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chair for Baby
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if it would work for my table with a big lip. (approx. 3inches). But it fit and works perfectly. It gets a bit dirty as can be expected but the washing machine made it look like new again. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dzasta

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my almost one year old a few months ago. It has been convenient to use at restaurants and when visiting family who does not have a high chair. I like using it at restaurants to keep my son out of dirty high chairs (yuck!). I have actually disassembled and machine washed (air dried) a few times and it has held up perfectly fine. Getting the bar back through when reassembling can take a little time and patience but it's not too difficult. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat doesn't sit flat
customer_reviews.text: The seat doesn't stay flat, so he's constantly sliding forward in the chair. I was hoping as he got bigger, it'd be flatter for him, but instead he ends up sitting so far forward, he has all his weight pressed up against the front of it, hurting his crotch. It's not that easy to clean, food gets caught in the corners and taking it off is a pair. Difficult to fold and put into it's bag.
customer_reviews.author: the mezzer

customer_reviews.title: We really like how this seat looks
customer_reviews.text: We really like how this seat looks, and how simply to use it is, and how it packs away into a bag that is stored in the seat. We also like the pocket on the back. The only thing we don't like is the gap between the seat and the table, even with the optional snap on tray, the baby pulls food towards her and it falls on the floor because of the gap. Once she gets better at picking up small pieces of food, I don't think it will be as much of an issue, but it's definitely something to be improved.
customer_reviews.author: g.anemone

customer_reviews.title: Fits in carry on luggage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic chair! We bought it for our 6 month old and she loves being able to sit at the table with us. We brought it to her grandparents' house and it fit perfectly in our carry on luggage. We noticed a gap of an inch or so when it was attached to a square table, but the gap disappeared when we attached it to a round table, so be prepared to get the tray or have food/toys slip through the gap if you are using a square/rectangle table. Overall, I like this much more than a traditional high chair because of how compact it is and how much closer our daughter can get to the action!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy attachment to any table
customer_reviews.text: I love that it attaches to my table. My table has an extra wide wooded lip around the whole thing, so I was worried the high chair wasn't going to be able to loosen enough to go over the lip. It works great and I take it traveling with us in case if we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K.

customer_reviews.title: Careful with a buckle
customer_reviews.text: My four month old LOVED it, this is her sitting in it for the first time - she literally wouldn’t stop smiling! Feels nice and sturdy, and works great with Mumby Mat to close the gap. The only con is the buckle - be very careful buckling the baby in - my squirmy little girl wouldn’t stop moving and I pinched her with the buckle - it was very painful!
customer_reviews.author: B.Dub312

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the updates !
customer_reviews.text: We used this chair 6 years ago with my oldest daughter. Unfortunately I sold it after she grew out of it. So I bought this one for our 7 month old.... the updates are AWESOME!!! I love the color options and the fact that the side metal bars are covered by fabric. Also that the strap in belt is Velcro away so that little baby hands cant try to get it undone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible harness
customer_reviews.text: The chair is nice, but the harness is useless. I just wraps around the child's waist so if you have a strong, active baby they can just climb right out! Don't buy if your baby can use their legs!
customer_reviews.author: mjp23

customer_reviews.title: Really great looking seat - we get compliments on it all ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great looking seat - we get compliments on it all the time. It's great to fold up and bring to restaurants if we know there will be no highchair. Easy & quick removal and install. The material holds up to cleaning and still looks like new a year later. I usually hand scrub, but have run it through the machine and dryer a few times too (even though directions say not too). Usually items associated with baby mealtime become super gross, but this chair still looks great, clean and stylish. Highly recommend! Get the tray too, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Person Who Bought A Thing

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated, these are great because your child can sit at the table with everyone else. They are very portable and take up very little space, compared to either a high cair or booster. My only complaint is that the fabric gets pretty dirty and it would be great to have an affordable replacement fabric set to swap out when the chair gets dirty. Or some kind of lightweight cover that is easily removable and washable. We get by, but it's a little bit of a pain to time washing the cover with meals.
customer_reviews.author: skidali

customer_reviews.title: Gap Between Chair & Table
customer_reviews.text: There is a gap between the chair and the table that causes food to fall on the floor. It is definitely secure and sturdy, but cleanup after dinner has become a nightmare. I'd suggest checking out competing products before spending your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Keeley

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for a newborn to grow into and use for years
customer_reviews.text: Eliminating the need to worry about a "high-chair" makes this one of the best baby gift imaginable. The Inglesina Fast (meaning quick-and-easy-to-attach and detach) Table Chair is the most appreciated new baby gift I've ever sent. It can't be used until the baby can sit up but then remains useful until a child weighs forty pounds. I think calling it a "Fast Table"conveys a bit of confusion and I've often wondered why Inglesina wouldn't call it simply a "Portable Table Chair." It's offered in an array of wonderful colors and the detachable canvas is washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mermer

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves watching me in the kitchen. Has a few finger snacks while I chop away. We love to take it to restaurants so we don't have to deal with free standing highchair that take up space and are often dirtier than we like.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hemm

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We live this chair. We have kept it clipped on our patio table all summer. Super easy to attach on to a table and has held up through the weather. The lap belt keeps the kid locked in too. Not easy to clean though. Because it’s cloth is gets messy pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Julia T

customer_reviews.title: So far, so GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this chair in a few different restaurants as well as at the bowling alley. It is very sturdy and conveniently portable. I absolutely love it! We tested it first on our dining room table and my husband was able to lean on it with his entire body weight and it did not budge! The best part is we can have our son (7 months old) sit in between us in a booth instead of him being at the end of the table where people are constantly walking past and many times bumping into the not so clean/comfy high chair. It is definitely worth the money. Quality construction and materials used. We highly recommended this chair!
customer_reviews.author: AshantyB

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our "restaurant chairs." I bought these when our twins were too small for restaurant high chairs (which are usually broken). They attach quickly to most tables - I scout out restaurants based on table sturdiness now - and are completely solid once afixed. Our kids much prefer these to other high chairs because they sit higher. I give them 4.9 stars: I do wish they folded better. I cram the pair into a duffle bag but it's not pretty.
customer_reviews.author: GrayHayes

customer_reviews.title: HAD TO WAIT IT WAS ON BACK ORDER
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A GIFT FOR A BABY SHOWER THAT WAS DONE ON LINE THROUGH AMAZON SO THE MOM TOLD ME THIS WAS AN AMAZING CHAIR SHE HAS SEEN ONE THAT WAS WHY SHE HAD ASKED FOR ONE FOR HER SECOND CHILD
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Penny

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Tested out right out the box and my daughter enjoyed it. Gets tight enough with no wiggle but still kinda freaks me out but she is securely in there. Haven't made a big mess yet so I cant comment on the ease of cleaning. I'll update later if its troublesome. Cant wait to try it at a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this chair! Before getting this chair, we had a Fischer Price chair that attached to a regular dining room chair, but this is so much better! It's light weight, easy to use, well designed, sturdy and practical. We love having our daughter right at the table with us, and being able to put her beside one of us in a booth at a restaurant. I also recommend getting the Inglesina tray to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Green

customer_reviews.title: Buy the older model if you can find it  (the one w/o the zip up flaps)
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair but loved the older model. This model has some weird flaps that zip up around the "U" shaped bars. Totally unnecessary. The zip up flaps prevent the chair from properly folding up for transport and they aren't super easy to put on every time you hook the chair up. Once installed the seat is amazing and very secure. I feel my child is very safe in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chair. We purchased it for our 11 month old grandson when he comes to visit. It was extremely easy to attatch to the counter and table. We appreciated the ease it was to put him in and take him out. The construction is very sturdy and well made. My only suggestion and possible concern is cleaning when it gets extremely loved! Otherwise, we couldn't be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Seat at the Table Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the Orange color! It's so vibrant, just as it looks in the picture online. What my husband & like most, is that it allows our baby to be a part of dinner time or snack time with us, right at the table, not separated in his own chair to the side or on top of the table. It's nice, because our baby always acted like he wanted to be a part of things, like a mini-adult in the making at 5 months old, ha-ha! I think he truly enjoys sitting next to us at the table (FYI I also recommend buying the snack tray that goes with this too)!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable baby chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great counter chair for baby. It has a cushion seat and is padded all around. Even the metal bars that loop under the counter have a padded fabric that zips over it to make sure baby doesn't hit her legs. The safety buckle also has a fabric piece that goes over it so baby won't be pushed against a hard clasp. The carry bag is also conveniently tucked into the bottom of the seat- not even noticeable when tucked away- it is also easy to stuff in neatly bc even my husband did it with ease and he has no patience for neatly putting things away! This is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DHJ

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all babies
customer_reviews.text: After the Grand Duchess sat in a restaurant high chair and chewed on the table that was head level and became sick we purchased this..... it sits your baby up at a comfortable height to eat from the table not head high to eat the table.... easy to carry and set up... wish we had purchased one for the grand diva a few years back.... we’ll worth the money and the removable tray is easily cleaned and all fits perfect in a compact case.... love this and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this chair. It gets three stars because it's not super "fast" and I think it should have been made with a little more wiggle room for tables with skirts. It does fit our table, but it's such a pain to get on and off (we have to loosen it to the absolute limit to get it under the table edge) that's we've installed it at our kitchen bar. Our daughter loves it there because she can sit and play, watching us while we cook. But it was intended to travel with us to other places and it would not be easy to use that way.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great little chair! It packs away pretty small and hooks onto most tables. The space between the table and baby’s chest is a pain but not a dealbreaker - though we have broken a few restaurant plates down that space. So much easier to handle baby in a chair than on your lap when at a restaurant with no highchair though!
customer_reviews.author: MaLintle

product_meta.title: Inglesina Fast Table Chair - Award-Winning Convenient Baby High Chair - Use at Most Tables or Restaurants Without Leaving Scratches {Navy}
product_meta.description: Color:NavyThe Inglesina Fast Table Chair is designed with parents and babies in mind, from its quick set up at most tables to its durable construction. This baby high chair will allow for a quick and easy mealtime whether at home or on the go, and includes an integrated travel-friendly carry bag. Travel with legendary Inglesina style and fine Italian design, this table chair features simple twist-tight couplings and is compatible with most types of tables up to 3.5” thick, and leaving them scratch-free. The Fast Table Chair is comfortable too; featuring a lifted backrest, firm seat, and fabric covered wide tubes. Traveling is a breeze with this baby chair; the fold-flat closing system was designed for easy setup and hassle-free operation. The optional dining tray accessory features deep borders surrounding the eating surface to help keep food on the tray, and snaps easily onto the Fast Table chair's arms. Dimensions when open: 14" x 17" x 11". Dimensions when closed: 14" x 17" x 4". Weight: 4.2 pounds. Max allowable weight: 37 pounds. March 2016 update - the Inglesina Fast Table Chair is compliant to the newly released ASTM F1235-15 federal safety standard.
feature_bullets: EASY & SECURE SETUP - Inglesina’s Fast Table Chair fits tables up to 3.5" thick and is perfect for use at home or while traveling. The easy twist-tight coupling is fast and secure and gives your baby a seat at the table.
PORTABLE, COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN - Complete with an integrated travel-friendly carry bag, the Fast Table Chair is easy to pack and always within reach.
DURABLE & WASHABLE MATERIALS - Ideal for babies & toddlers between 6 and 36 months, and up to 37 pounds, the durable & washable design ensures this product will serve for years.
HANDY STORAGE POCKET - The functional design includes a convenient storage pocket to ensure immediate access to wipes, toys, snacks and more.

ITALIAN DESIGN - Inspired by the elegant carriages seen in British Court, Inglesina has been designing quality strollers, highchairs and table chairs since 1963, with a focus on safety, practicality, and utilizing the finest materials.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,389 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
